DOC.brief_title: Nivolumab Treating Patients With HTLV-Associated T-Cell Leukemia/Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine safety tolerability nivolumab patient HTLV-associated adult T-cell leukemia lymphoma ( ATLL ) . II . To determine efficacy nivolumab patient HTLV-associated ATLL . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine effect nivolumab HTLV-1 proviral deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) load . II . To determine effect nivolumab anti-HTLV-1 anti-ATLL immune response . III . To determine effect nivolumab HTLV-1 integration site clonality . OUTLINE : Patients receive nivolumab intravenously ( IV ) 60-120 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 2 week 46 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 1 year .
